column1: Smoque BBQ////I finally ate at Smoque after several tasty take-out orders. It was a Tuesday evening but the line was pretty long
column2: but did not extend out the door. The ribs taste even better on the premises! Someone will ask if you are dining in or taking out
column3: and will point out an empty table for you. We left a bit after 8PM (they close at 9PM) and the place was still crowded.
